newsitem.title: USA: Paul Harris April same store sales rise.
newsitem.headline: Paul Harris April same store sales rise.

text.p: Paul Harris Stores Inc said Thursday its same-store sales in April rose three percent, and its net sales rose two percent to $14.1 million versus $13.8 million in April 1996.

The company also announced a 10 percent increase in comparable store sales for the first quarter of 1997 and an 11 percent increase in net sales to $43.8 million versus $39.6 million for the first quarter of fiscal 1996.

"We were very pleased with our first quarter sales and comps and have now reported the sixth consecutive quarter over the previous year's quarter improvement in sales," Charlotte Fischer, chairman, said in a statement.
